name: Maliban Real Temptation Chocolate
description: Experience bliss as you bite into the new Maliban Real Temptation biscuit. The sun-baked rich crust enrobes the purest of smooth choco-cream made to mesmerize your taste buds. Indulge your senses with the heavenly taste of Maliban Real Temptation. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
